channel.title: Kernel on Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Kernel on Hugo

item.title: Hello Rootkitty
item.description: Event Challenge Category Points Solves ecsc Hello Rootkitty pwn 500 24 TL;DR A custom kernel module was vulnerable to a buffer overflow, with a small ropchain I escalated my privileges to root and with a sys_chmod syscalls I got the flag. Description Recon I’m not a Linux kernel expert, everything might not be 100% correct, but I’ll do my best to summarize what I understood.
